text: Tot, kotoryy prizyvayet k Istine Allakha neveruyushchikh, otritsayushchikh Yego znameniya, podoben pastukhu, kotoryy krichit na skotinu, i ona ne mozhet razlichit' slov, a tol'ko slyshit zov i kriki i nichego ne ponimayet: oni glukhi, nemy, slepy k istine, nichego dobrogo ne govoryat i ne razumeyut
